column1: apoc.load.directory.async.add(name, cypher, pattern, urlDir, {}) YIELD name, status, pattern, cypher, urlDir, config, error - Adds or replaces a folder listener with a specific name, which is triggered for all files with the given pattern and executes the specified Cypher query when triggered. Returns a list of all listeners. It is possible to specify the event type in the config parameter.
apoc.load.directory.async.list() YIELD name, status, pattern, cypher, urlDir, config, error - Lists all folder listeners
apoc.load.directory.async.remove(name) YIELD name, status, pattern, cypher, urlDir, config, error - Removes a folder listener by name and returns all remaining listeners, if any
